about_the_game:
Step back into the world of NUMINA and prepare to unravel the gripping conclusion to the epic saga. In Part II, you will once again team up with Shawn to uncover the sinister truth behind Ecclesia's dark intentions.

Part II picks up right where Part I ended. You can play with your previous save files and continue the story!

With the world of Alterna on the brink of war, your bond with Shawn will be tested like never before. Together, you'll encounter new allies, face off against dangerous enemies, and explore new and exciting locations, each with their own unique secrets and challenges.

As you unravel the dark mystery of the Ecclesia, you'll encounter tough choices that will not only determine the course of the world but also affect the fate of your allies. With multiple endings to discover, every decision you make will have a lasting impact on the story. Will you be the hero Alterna needs, or will you chose a different path?

Featuring an engrossing character-driven story, dynamic battle system, and challenging puzzles, Numina Part II promises to be an unforgettable journey that will leave you on the edge of your seat. Don't miss out on the chance to experience the thrilling conclusion!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1500 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Numina - Part 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
